Name: Hyades Light Infantry
Details: One of the oldest regiments of the Taurian Defense Force, the Hyades Light Infantry was originally created to patrol Flanagan's Nebula. Nicknamed the 'Taurian Nomads', the Hyades Light Infantry is usually based in Jamestown and assigned to patrol the Davion border as part of the Taurian II Corps, but its battalions have lately been deployed in response to pirate raids all across the Concordat.
